knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
library(here)
library(readxl)
library(dplyr) #for pipe function
```

```{r}
Omloop <- read_excel(here("Project", "AllRaceResults", "2_Omloop.xlsx"))
Omloop$raceName <- "Omloop"
Strade <- read_excel(here("Project", "AllRaceResults", "3_strade.xlsx"))
Strade$raceName <- "Strade"

#use this to combine datasets
total <- rbind(Omloop, Strade)

#just to filter out the first couple of rows
test <- Omloop %>% filter(row_number() %in% c(1:10))

#just to select the column we need for race results dataset
test2 <- select(test, Rnk, Rider, raceName)
testRider <- read_excel(here("Project", "testRiderProfile.xlsx"))

#general process here
test3 <- merge(testRider, test2, by.x="RiderName", by.y="Rider")
testRace <- read.csv(here("Project", "RaceProfile.csv"))
testRace2<-testRace %>% filter(RaceName=="Omloop")
test4 <- merge(test3, testRace2, by.x="raceName", by.y="RaceName")
```
